scenario_text.value:
You’ve been pale for a while now, Aoi. How
are you holding up?

Ah, well... If I’m being honest, it’s taking
all I’ve got to deal with this place...

You shouldn’t push yourself if you’re scared,
okay?

Thank you, but...our friends might be facing
something even scarier, you know?

(Aoi’s doing her best to scour the area.
I should leave her to it.)
